1690620.name: Ultimate Action Hero
1690620.description:
Lights, Camera, Action!!!

Ultimate Action Hero takes you to a world of blockbuster action movies. You're a stuntman and your new job is to double for a famous actor who doesn't do his own stunts...
Shoot, punch, kick and blow things up! Become iconic badass from your favourite movies and experience intense action scenes. Do all that with an epic synthwave soundtrack!

Features


  • Play in movie scenes which are a mix of exciting sidescroller gunplay and acrobatic action platforming
  • Explore Movie Studio and meet its eccentric Crew
  • Drive awesome vehicles
  • Unlock new Costumes and abilities
  • Search for hidden collectibles

Do you have what it takes to be the Ultimate Action Hero?
1690620.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
